text: 频道已校准。你可以开始使用了。
今天你想要听什么？现在我能听到更远，更远的声音。
engtext: What would you like to hear today? My range extends further now, much farther than before.

text: ……没人在吗？也许我可以稍稍离开一会儿。
engtext: ... Is anyone out there? Perhaps I could use a break.

text: 没有收到任何信号……不是因为故障，而是外面风平浪静。
engtext: No signals detected ... not due to malfunction, just because all is calm outside.

text: 头上的花还在吗？那就好。
engtext: Are those flowers still on my head? Ah, good.

text: 你说这身涂装？哦，这只是为了配合这里的氛围感。
engtext: This paint job? Oh, just blending in with the vibe here.

text: 悲痛与难过依旧在外面徘徊。真希望我听不到这些声音。
engtext: Grief and sorrow still linger out there. I wish I couldn't tune them out.

text: 请稍等，我需要一点时间来适应这根新的天线。
engtext: Pardon me. I need time to adjust to this new antenna.
